item.description:
No plans for tonight? Fancy a change from the usual? Want to hear some live music and get up and dance? Rockafellas in Salem has a great live band tonight - Mary Beth Maes, good pub food and drinks and promises a good time for all! Just come and join us for dinner if you prefer!

Let's try something new! Salem has plenty of parking.

Check out the Rockefellas website at http://www.rockafellasofsalem.com/index.php ;

ABOUT US

Rockafellas is a premier casual restaurant in historic downtown Salem, MA with superior food, drinks, entertainment and service.

Our menu features a variety of fine dishes for any palate, including fresh seafood, Black Angus steaks, refreshing salads, and gourmet pizza. We carry a wide selection of choice beer and wine to complement each meal.

Our expansive, full-service bar is the perfect place to enjoy one of our specialty drinks and a few Bar Bites with friends. Enjoy live entertainment including rock, salsa, country, jazz, and big band in a comfortable, charming setting. Join us for lunch, dinner, or a night on the town!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the restaurant saving a table...
item.name: Last minute: let's get up and dance at Rockafellas in Salem!
